Blackfang came outside when he heard his name.

Blackfang: Who needs me for what?

He did remark Wolfblade and thought she looked nice, but didn't try 
anything.

He quickly realized what the subject was about and joined.

Blackfang: Oh yeah... The Tripred gun-thing... Hey, but wait a 
second. Won't destroying Unicron change our future? 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice thought as the others talked.  Then he got an idea.
> "Hey, Tripredacus guy!  Can you change your weapon so it will 
repulse him instead of damage him?  If we harness enough energy, and 
we catch him off guard, we could shove him back through the rift.  
Then all we would have to do is seal the instablility."
> He was worked up, the plan would work... if a few things happened 
right.  One, securing a large enough energy supply for Malice, two, 
a way to get energy to Malice, and three, get energy from said 
bounty hunter to the repulser.
> "Please! We have to try this!  It will work!"
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nighlight:
> 
> "And we must be quick to act before he arrived to Earth "replied 
the

> 
> Windlord looked her and he said to rodimus "So will be good idea 
ask
